title: Forgotten corner
creator_credit: Samara McIlroy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: ‘A little further up the road and a little further into the wilderness than you think.’ Samara McIlroy pays loving tribute to her special corner of Victoria, a place where you can still drop in for a ‘cuppa’ without ringing first.
creator_credit_for_label: Samara McIlroy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
